welcome_benefits: Complimentary Membership of Swiggy One & Times Prime

Movie & Dining: Get 5x (20) reward points per Rs. 150 spent on Swiggy and Zomato. Get a Buy One Get One offer on BookMyShow movie tickets for shows on Friday, Saturday, and Sunday.
Rewards Rate: 4 Reward Points on every Rs 150 spent and up to 10x RPs on Smartbuy spends.
Reward Redemption: 1 reward point = Rs 0.5 redeemable on SmartBuy reward portal for flight & hotels bookings, 1 reward point = 0.5 Air miles.
Travel: Get 8 complimentary airport lounge access across the world for both primary as well as add-on cardholders.
Domestic Lounge Access: Up to 8 complimentary domestic lounge access every year
International Lounge Access: Up to 8 complimentary international lounge access every year
Insurance Benefits: Insurance cover worth up to Rs 1 crore in case of an air accident and an emergency cover of Rs 25 lac in case of hospitalization abroad.

fees_charges.Spend-Based Waiver: Renewal fee waiver on spending over Rs. 3 lakhs in the previous year.
fees_charges.Rewards Redemption Fee: Rs 99 per redemption request (plus applicable taxes)
fees_charges.Cash Advance Charges: 2.5 % of the withdrawal amount subject to a minimum charge of Rs 500

product_details: Get a Complimentary Membership of Swiggy One and Times Prime as a welcome benefit.
4 Reward Points on every Rs 150 spent, and up to 10x Reward Points on Smartbuy spends, with your HDFC Bank Diners Club Privilege Credit card.
Accelerated 5x RPs on your Swiggy and Zomato spends.
8 Complimentary Lounge visits both India and abroad
Insurance Cover worth up to Rs 1 crore in case of an Air Accident.
